content: I think I'll start by using Instagram's Question Sticker to collect questions from followers before the Q&A session, and then answer them during the live session. I'll also consider using Polls to ask followers what type of skin care topics they're most interested in discussing during the Q&A session. Additionally, I might collaborate with a skincare expert to take over my Instagram Live for a Q&A session, providing followers with expert advice and insights. Do you have any suggestions on how I can measure the success of my Q&A session and track engagement?
